TopicTitle: [1.0.2] Crash when reverting to the SpacePlane Hangar

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0.2.842. Windows 64-bit. Steam

What Happens: The Game Crashes when reverting to the space hangar

Steps to Replicate: (It happens always)

1) Click the Runway

2) Click launch, using the last used ship and crew.

3) Click "Esc" and then choose "Revert Flight" and then "Revert to SpacePlane Hangar"

4) A wild CRASH appeared! (After loading the SpacePlane Hangar)

Steps to Replicate: (It happens always)

1) Launch a Plane from the SpacePlane Hangar.

3) Click "Esc" and then choose "Revert Flight" and then "Revert to SpacePlane Hangar"

4) A wild CRASH appeared! (After loading the SpacePlane Hangar)
